snippet: SCHWARTZ--Selma. Nov. 2, 1912 - May 22, 2013 "You went away, and my heart went with you." Darling Mommy, we miss you terribly. Love, Estelle and Alan 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Selma. Nov. 2, 1912 - May 22, 2013 "You went away, and my heart went with you." Darling Mommy, we miss you terribly. Love, Estelle and Alan 1/3
